On your way to your next typical English lesson on this typical Monday morning, you hear Emily calling you. "Hey, Ant! Wait up!" she shouts, followed by quick footsteps. You hope she wouldn't act all weird again, so you pretend not to hear her. But, inevitably, she catches up to you.
"Hey, are you avoiding me?" she inquires. You turn to look at her and reply, but you are stunned by what you see. The first thing that strikes you is that Emily is at least 2 inches taller than you now. Also, her beautiful auburn hair was down, rather than being tird up like it often was. Her zip-up jacket thing also had the zip quite low, showing off part of her cleavage. And not only this, but her skirt had been pulled up abnormally high.
"Hello? Earth to Ant?" Emily says, snapping you out of your trance.
"Uh, sorry, I was daydreaming." you lie. Emily laughs. "You and your imagination, eh?" she chuckles, flicking her hair and causing light to reflect from it. There was no doubt in your mind that Emily was showing off. But why is she slightly taller? You ponder this as you notice she is not wearing tights either, like she normally does.
"So I was wondering, how about getting lunch with me later?" she asks, smiling sweetly...
12112.title: What's going on?

choices: She has grown even more, and it is obvious to everyone now.
It's the same, for now. Class begins.
121121.content:
This was even further into the realm of the unexpected, but you'll go with the flow.
"Yeah, sure," you say, nonchalant, but another point comes to mind.
"You know, this is such a strange day. First, I wake up like I'm wondering in a daze, then you, one of my oldest friends, is all of a sudden interested in me. Pardon my rudeness, but is anything... different going on? I feel like I'm the oblivious part of a joke or something." Out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaks, as the saying goes. Immediately you want to bite back the words, but hold your already-rueful tongue for now.
"I didn't sense anything like that, Ant, but I'll understand if you don't want to..."

She lets her statement hang loosely, giving you her best sympathy face that she has used to overpower you on numerous occassions. This time isn't any different, so you drop the subject and head to class. Anticlimiatically your next class is one in which you are not only with Emily but the seat one across from her. Well, there's really no reason to maintain any spite from her just for being a little more courageous and flirty this morning. It was sort of refreshing, even. Besides, you could see the two of you going far with this, and it had been a plan in progress for you to ask her out eventually. She gives you the same sweet smiles as she sits down, and you hear the slightest creak from her chair as she sits. Making a double-take, you swear she gained at least two more inches added to her since you last looked. You rub your eyes vigorously, and look again.
121121.title: Hiding Something

choices: Teacher: Emily, can I see you outside for a second?
Emily: So Ant, how about that lunch later?
1211211.content:
"Um, Emily...?" you say to her, noticing everyone staring at her. "You look sort of... different, you know. Everyone's looking at you." you inform her quietly. She looks up from her textbook.
"Oh, I guess they noticed that I have my hair down today." she says, absentmindedly. "And by the look of the amount of people staring... it looks good!" she giggles, twirling a lock of hair around her index finger.
"I don't think it's that, Emily." you whisper, nervously.
"Hey Em, stand up for a sec, will ya?" Brad requests. He is a boy in your class who is friends with Emily.
"Uh, OK Brad." Emily says, standing up slowly. A gasp arises, followed by deathly silence. Emily is now the tallest person in the class by several inches. You estimate that she stands at about six foot nine, compared to her previous hight of about five foot eight. So it wasn't your imagination after all.
1211211.title: "What, is something stuck on my face?"

choices: "I'm going to have to take you to Discipline."
"I'll have to send you home..."
12112111.content:
The following mess would be easiest to describe to you in the following form:

Teacher: Emily, can I see you outside for a second?
Emily: Wait, why? Is something wrong?
Teacher: *laughs nervously* Um, haven't you noticed?
Emily: Noticed what...? *upon saying this she looks down at herself* Oh, Lord!
Teacher: Follow me, Miss Penn.
Emily: *embarassed, Emily nods and follows him out the door*

You are left sinking into your seat, feeling the weight of such a queer day on your shoulders. Brad's eyes are as wide as dinner plates as he watches your mutual tall friend exit the classroom. Right when the door shuts private conversations (mostly gossip) echo from within the class, but you are just left there to think for yourself. Technically, that was your girlfriend out there, who now dwardfed your height by over a foot. Normally you knew that size didn't matter, but how did you know she wouldn't continue growing until there was no room left, or... you massage your temples, trying to expunge those cynical thoughts. She was your close friend either way, and it would be your job to help her out of any problem.

You march ahead, feeling courageous but not trying to act that way. None of your classmates notice; preoccupied as they were with their talking. Placing your ear to the door, you prepare for some eavesdropping for her benefit. This wasn't for you, but you had to know what was happening.
"Emily, did you take any weird pills at hom or something? What's going on with you?" the teacher demanded, and you can imagine his nervous form in your mind, and nearly laugh out loud as Emily answers him:
"No, nothing like that Mr. R. Everything was fine until I got into your class," you hear her lie, partially anyway.
12112111.title: Lecture

choices: You burst through the door and stop the teacher.
Emily shoves the teacher out of the way and runs off crossly.
121121112.content:
"I'll have to send you home, Emily. You need to see a doctor." you hear 'Mr. R' say. You continue eavesdropping.
"I'm fine, really! I mught have just had an allergic reaction to something." Emily protests. This is followed by a muffled creaking sound and a squeal.
"Look Emily, that's what I mean. I may be a Maths teacher, but I do know that you can't have an allergic reaction of this magnitude. I'll call your parents to come pick you up."
121121112.title: "I'll have to send you home..."

choices: Class ends, and you separate from her to go your next class.
Continue in Emily's shoes as she shifts classes.
1211211121.content:
With emotions on the fritz you decide to break your cover. If there ever was a right time, this was it, and your conscience would be appeased. Bursting through the door, you rush up to Mr. Roentgen, intensity growing. He is startled by your entrance, like you pictured he'd be.
"Look, she has no idea what's going on, obviously. That's no reason to get all fo these people involved just because she's gone through some unheard of growth spurt. Was she hurting anyone? No. Is this disrupting your class? Yes, but only because you started it. Now please, as your student, I'm asking you to just leave her be and resume class before anyone else in this wall catches winds of it," you say breathlessly.

He shakes his head slowly, looking at the ground. Emily beams with pride, and strolls over to you, placing a slender arm on your shoulder.
"Well, Mr. R? He's right you know," Emily offers, looking him in his now upright eyes.
"Fine - fine! Just get inside quick before the bell rings and we're forced to suspend."
You and Emily trade victorious grins and shuffle back into class, amidst the halted whispering of your peers. Brad gives you a thumbs-up on your way back to your seat, and you sit as Mr. R continues his lesson in haste. Well, you suppose you'll be having lunch with her still.
1211211121.title: Breakthrough

choices: Emily grows about an inch with each bite of her panini.
You eat your lunch, discussing the growth spurts.
12112111211.content:
After a long lesson with tension in the air the whole time, the bell finally rings and ends the charade.
"OK, clear away your desks and you can go." Mr. Roentgen announces to the class. This is followed by the rustling of bags and the clunking of chairs.
The whole class stands up, with Emily above them by a few inches. You feel for her as she still seems to be receiving lots of funny looks and gossip in her direction. On your way out of the room, you approach Brad.
"Hey, Brad." you say. "I'm not in Emily's next class, could you make sure things don't get too out of hand?" you request.
"Yeah, sure, I'll stand up for her." he replies. You nod in response to this and make your way to History.

You breeze through the lesson without much effort. 'Joan of Arc' may be written on the board, but 'Emily' is written in your mind. She is the only thing you could think of for the time being, whether this was because of her growth spurt, or because you were secretly excited about having lunch with her. It could even be both.
You are scolded by your teacher several times as you eavesdrop on your fellow classmates' gossip, and you'd never guess what (or, more appropriately, who) they were talking about. Emily here, Emily there, Emily everywhere. She was popular as it was; this would do wonders for her reputation, whether in a good way or a bad way.
Come to think of it, eating lunch with a taller Emily sounded more inviting than with a regular Emily due to your macrophilic brain. There were bound to be others like you in your school, right? They were probably secretly loving it too, as Emily was certainly not a bad-looking girl, especially considering the fact that redheads were often deemed 'uncool' by your peers.

Finally, after what seemed like an even longer lesson, the bell rings and you hastily leave. You somewhat ache as you approach the canteen, especially so when you think of Emily's sweet smile. Oh, what a sweet smile it was.

Upon arriving at the canteen, you notice a crowd of boys around the now taller Emily. She looks annoyed and the boys are talking to her in a mocking manner, from what you can hear, so you approach them.
"Hey, leave her alone!" you shout, attracting the attention of the gang & the attention of Emily. "Oh, hey Ant!" she waves.
"Are they bothering you?" you ask Emily, annoyed.
"Yeah, they kinda are." she replies. The girl was over a head taller than the tallest of these guys; couldn't she just shove him or something?
"What are you gonna do about it, you giant freak?" one of them insults Emily. You flare up with rage and shove the guy, but he half-dodges and collides with Emily.
"Eep! Don't touch me!" she shrieks, shoving the guy. He is sent stumbling backwards, and falls over onto the sandwich shelf. This causes the whole canteen to erupt into peals of laughter. Well, it was off to a good start so far.
"Thanks, Ant!!" Emily says happily, hugging you.
"Gah!" you exclaim. "D-d-do you think you c-could hug me a little looser?"
"Whoops, sorry!" Emily apologizes, loosening her grip. She soon stops hugging you, and plucks a cheese & ham panini from the canteen shelf, co-incidentally choosing the same thing as you.
"I'll pay for that!" you insist, tipping 2 dollars into Emily's large hand. She grins.
"Aww! That's so nice of you!" she says, stoked. You both sit down and begin to eat your lunch together...
12112111211.title: It's Going Well So Far

choices: Nothing, you get through the day and walk with Emily to her house
Emily has a huge growth spurt in class
121121112111.content: As you and Emily are talking back and forward to each other, you notice that with every bite of her sandwich she grows a little bit. After the bell rings and you two get up, and when you do you find out that she was growing while eating cause she is bow about 7ft 5in. As you look up at her she asks"Hey Ant, after school do you think you can come over to my house, its going to be just you and me cause my parents are out of town". And you ask" Why?" She just replies with" I have to show you something" and you say" Ok, I'll be there" then the two of you split off to different classes. While in class...
121121112111.title: Lunchroom growth

choices: "...I've discovered a way to grow, Ant."
"...and yet I still have no idea how I grew."
121121112112.content:
Emily insists you follow her to her table, and you did agree earlier after all, so you start to pick at your lunch, mind still distracted with other things. You can't help but try and catche a glimpse of Emily's now enlargened body through the corner of your eye at brief intervals, while still trying to focus on the conversation at hand. Taking a small nibble of the panini, you figure it might be time to stop biting your tongue.
"Okay, everyone else seems to know what's going on but me," you begin, letting it settle.

"What, about the fact that people are suddenly harassing me?" Emily asks indirectly.
"No, no, about your growth spurt. I mean, earlier today you my height, maybe even shorter, and all of a sudden you're about sevent feet tall! I mean, I know you're still you, and all, but none of this fits right."
"Truth is, ant, I'm as clueless as you are. In fact, I had to tell everyone who asked some new piece of nonsense. They'll find out eventually when they compare stories, but still..." Emily says, voice dragging.
121121112112.title: Talking

choices: "Nobody else."
Emily is interrupted by a 7 foot Danielle tapping you on the shoulder.
1211211121121.content:
Emily leans over the table, close to you.
"I've discovered a way to grow, Ant." she informs you. Your face twists into shock.
"What!?" you shout, catching the attention of a few nearby people. You clear your throat.
"...What?" you whisper. "Why?"
Emily looks solemn. "Well, I HAD, but it sorta went a bit wrong." she explains. "I was only meant to grow an inch or two, but now I can't stop it!"
"H-How?" you ask, dazed.
"Danielle told me how. She-"
"Danielle can grow too!?" you exclaim as quietly as you can while still sounding surprised.
"Uh, yeah, I think so." Emily replies. This causes you to choke on a piece of your panini.
"Who else knows!?"
"Umm..."
1211211121121.title: "...I've discovered a way to grow, Ant....

choices: "Forget that, this predicament is more important." you reply, sternly.
"Oh, alright then." you smile.
12112111211211.content:
"Nobody else, yet." Emily replies.
"Yet?"
Emily looks grim. "Well, you don't know who Danielle could go blabbering to." she says. "But I promise I won't tell."
This is followed by a yelp as Emily grows another couple of inches. You feel a thousand suspicious stares burn into your skull.
"Emily, are you sure you can't control it?" you whisper nervously.
"Well, sort of." she says. "I can make myself grow, but I can't make myself shrink anymore, and I can't control these random growth spurts."
You nod in acknowledgement, but then you realize something crucial.
"I noticed that you seem to be growing every half an hour or so." you tell your friend. Emily looks intrigued at this observation.
"That's interesting!" she replies. "So, 2 inches every half hour, and I'm about 7 feet now..." she says, thinking. What is she doing?

"Oh dear." Emily says, after about 5 minutes of thinking and panini nibbling.
"What is it?" you reply, feeling slightly nauseous from the sheer disbelief inside you.
"I knew my high grade in Math would pay off..." she says, nervously. "If I keep going at this rate, I will be about 15 feet tall by this time tomorrow."
This was like a dream to you, although you are still not sure if it is a good one or a bad one. Emily's smart, surely she can figure out something to do, right?

"Um, we need to find help, fast." you announce. Emily cocks her head.
"What about our little lunch date?" she asks...
12112111211211.title: A Slight Predicament

choices: The duration between growth spurts decreases gradually.
Emily puts her hand around your back and moves closer to you.
121121112112112.content:
You eye your friend curiously, hesitating. She responds by giving you her super-sweet smile and batting her eyelashes. "Go on... whaddya say?" she says.
"Oh, alright then." you chuckle, giving in to her once again. "I guess this is alright."
Emily squeals with delight, and leans over the table to give you a little peck on the cheek followed by another one of her sweet smiles. "Yeah, it is!" she replies, happily, biting her panini.
So, this 'date' with one of your best friends was not so bad after all. Emily was fun to be around, she was handling the situation well, and the fact that she was over a foot taller than you was enhancing the experience even further, although you didn't like to admit it.

You eventually finish your panini, and rise from your chair. "Well, that was nice!" you tell Emily.
"The panini was a bit small, though." she says, flatly. "How can they possibly sell a panini that small for $4?" she ponders. You laugh at this remark, and begin to leave the canteen with your (girl?)friend, watching as she ducks under the doorway.
121121112112112.title: "Oh, alright then." you smile.

choices: Emily suddenly grows another few inches,
Emily quickly bends over and kisses you on the cheek.
1211211121121121.content:
"So, what do you want to do now, Emily?" you ask your tall friend curiously. Your lunch date with her may be over, but you are enjoying yourself enough to want to spend more quality time with her,
"Um," she says, thinking, "I often just go hang out with my friends at lunchtime. But they all seem to be avoiding me today."
"Don't worry, I'm not avoiding you." you say reassuringly, triggering a smile from Emily. "I'm actually enjoying this quite a lot."
"So am I, Ant!" she says cheerfully. "Maybe we could go down to the gym and watch the girls' netball match?" she suggests. "You'd like to see all those girls running around in gym uniform, wouldn't you?" she teases, elbowing you harder than you would have liked.
"Nah, I've got a good-looking enough girl right next to me!" you blurt out, wishing you could suck your words back in. Your thoughts have a terrible tendency to escape through your mouth at the wrong times,
"Aww, that's so sweet!" Emily blushes, shuffling her feet. "You-"
Her speech is cut short with a quick squeal as she suddenly shoots up a few inches and hits her head on a lamp hanging from the ceiling.
"That's odd...!" she exclaims, rubbing her head. "I only had a growth spurt about 10 minutes ago."
You gulp, realizing what she could be implying. "I hope that was just a one off thing."
"Me too," she replies nervously.

Breaking the moment of awkward silence, a ripping sound can be heard briefly, causing Emily to look down in shock.
"Ehehe," she laughs very nervously, "my skirt just ripped a little."
"Uh-"
"Don't look!" she interrupts quickly, concealing her skirt with her bag. "You can see my underwear!"
"I guess that match at the netball court will have to wait then, haha." you joke, trying to keep Emily's mood up. Who knows what might happen, or when she could experience another growth spurt...?
1211211121121121.title: More Growth

choices: Emily wants to go home, and she wants you to go with her.
The bell rings, signalling the end of lunch, and the start of a lesson.
12112111211211211.content:
"Uuuhh," Emily mumbles nervously, "I'm going to have to go to the bathroom and, er, change."
You force a smile. "OK, but do you have any bigger clothes?"
"I think so." she says. "I have my gym kit in my bag, and it was a bit too big for me when I bought it. Maybe that'll do!"
"How-how do you manage to think straight in such a weird situation?" you ask curiously, met be a wry smile from Emily.
"I just pretend I'm having fun and then it's all OK." she explains. "Well, mostly."
Still feeling sick to the stomach about her last premature growth spurt, you ask her: "You're not having fun?"
"Ahaha, not entirely." she says. "I admit it's a little fun being taller than all those idiots who used to shove me around, but now the gr-"
*RRIP, THUD*

"EEK!" Emily squeals, bending over slightly.
"What!?" you ask suddenly, turning your head to your friend.
"My skirt... it ripped off!!" she frets, covering her panties with her now small bag. "And my head hit the ceiling!"
"Wahaay, Giganta's giving us a strip show now!" a passing guy says mockingly, laughing at Emily. You flare up with anger inside, but conceal it for Emily's sake. If she was anymore stressed than she already is, who knows what she might do?

"OK look, there's a disabled toilet here. Maybe you should go change."
"But Ant," she replies, "those are only for disabled people or emergencies!"
"Right, and this an emergency." you say hurriedly, opening her bag and grabbing her gym kit. "Here's your gym clothes." you say, handing them to her.
Emily looks at you fondly for a second or two. "Thanks, Ant." she smiles comfortingly, and ducks into the disabled toilet.

After a minute or two of waiting, Emily emerges from the room in her gym clothes. They are not ripped like the other clothes, but they are still awfully tight. Her shorts barely covered her butt, and her breasts looked like they were ready to burst out of the shirt. It would have to do for now, though, you decide.

Noticing the amount of people (and teachers) walking past paying little attention to Emily, you figure the knowledge of her growth is school-wide by now. This might be bad...
12112111211211211.title: Giganta

choices: "She said to send you home right now." you tell her. "I'll go with you."
"She didn't believe me, and thought the picture was faked." you tell her sadly.
121121112112112111.content:
"I want to go home, Ant." Emily says suddenly, looking down at you. How could you reply to that? Did her parents even know about the growth spurts yet??
"Um, OK, would you be allowed?" you ask, trying to sound helpful.
"Well they let you go home if you are ill, and I think this counts." she laughs. You feel reassured she is still somewhat cheery about the situation.
"Do your folks know about this yet?" you ask, saying what you are thinking. Obviously not, considering the expression on Emily's face when you mention it. It looks like you would have to think of something.
"Oh dear lord, you're right." she says worriedly. "I don't want to phone them, though."
"Why not? You're their daughter!" you say reassuringly.
"Maybe they'll think I'm a freak or something now that I'm like 9 feet tall." she says, sounding more upset every second.

"Here, I'll phone them for you. Just give me your ph-"
"Ant, I want you to come with me."
"Huh? Why?" you ask, confused.
"You've just been so helpful throughout this whole thing." she says. "I don't know what I'd have done without you!"
"Well OK, I don't mind." you reply, smiling. It's nice to know she still trusts you after such a traumatic event. "Shall I call your folks?"
"Yeah, if you don't mind." she says, sounding happier now and passing you her phone. "My mom's number is on there."

"Hold on, it's ringing..." you say holding the phone to your ear. "Uh, hello? Is this Emily's mom? It's Anthony Walker, Emily's friend...? No, not her boyfriend...."
Emily giggles slightly, putting you off a little.
"Yeah, it's kinda urgent. Huh? No, I'm using her phone... yeah. Anyway, you're going to find this kind of hard to believe... OK then, well, she has been experiencing growth spurts.... Yes, I know that happens naturally."
Emily chuckles again, clearly restraining herself.
"No, but these are big growth spurts... she's like 9 feet tall now... NO, WAIT! Please don't hang up! Alright, I'll send you a picture."
"Emily, how do you take a picture with this thing?" you ask hurriedly.
"Just press the button on the side." she says.
"Excuse me!" you say to a passing student. "Could you use this phone to take a picture of me and Emily?" you ask.
"Uh, sure. " he says reluctantly, grabbing the phone. You stand next to Emily for size comparison, not even reaching her breasts in height.
"Cheeeeese!" Emily says as the boy takes the picture and hands the phone back to you.

"OK, are you still there?" you say on the phone to Emily's mom. "I'll just send the picture.... no, wait, this isn't a joke."
Cries of shock can be heard loudly from the phone, and Emily's mom shouts something before hanging up quickly.
"What did she say?" Emily asks curiously...
121121112112112111.title: Say Cheese

choices: She stops growing for now
It's no where near done, she keeps growing
1211211121121121111.content:
"She wants you to come home right away," you tell Emily.

"Emily breaths a slight sigh of relief, "Ok, lets..." she stops short as she feels her feet starting to slide on the floor. She was 9'3" and having another growth spurt again. "Not again," Emily says. Her shirt rises a bit as she hits 9'6", bending over a bit as her head bumps the ceiling. She hears a ripping sound behind her, "Oh no," she moans as the back of her shorts rip.

"Lets get you out of here," You say as you grab Emily's hand and lead her to the doors.

Emily's growth was showing no signs of slowing down as she grew to 9'10, the sides of her shorts slowly ripping along with the back of her shirt. She trips over her own growing feet and falls foward, now at 10' her sleeves have ripped and the back of her shirt tears completely as she sits up. Emily screams as she covers her breasts, her shorts start to rip at the waist as she grows to 10'4.
1211211121121121111.title: Things are starting to look up?

choices: Go find Danielle for a possible solution.
Stay with Emily and help explain this to her folks.
12112111211211211112.content:
You manage to get Emily out the doors of the school before she gets too big to fit through them. Even after 10'8" Emily's growth is continuing unabated, and her shorts give out. She covers her crotch with one hand while keeping the other arm covering her breast in utter embarrassment as you and she head for her place...though you have more and more trouble keeping up with her growing gait and pace. Thankfully, she calms down enough for you to catch up even as she passes 12 feet in height.

"Why me?" you hear Emily complain as she continues to grow. She's clearly in the mini-giantess range now, beautiful, naked...and still growing even as she passes 14 feet in height. You turn your head to her and ask, "Danielle told you how to grow, right? Are you sure she didn't deceive you, or that you didn't misunderstand each other?" She replies, "Um...pretty sure. I mean, I'm pretty sure I said I only wanted to grow a couple of inches, and that Danielle had said this would do it..."

You question with, "Did she tell you if this would continue or not, and if there's a way to stop or even reverse your growth?"

After a few moments of silence, and her growing past 16 feet now, Emily admits, "I...never thought to ask her. I just assumed that it would stop once I got to my desired height. She did mention though that however big I get is permanent; I can't shrink back down after growing. I guess I'm stuck as a giant, growing freak for the rest of my life..."

Emily begins to cry at the statement. However, you certainly do not feel that she's a freak. You comfort your friend with, "I don't think you're a freak, Emily. Giant? Unquestionably so. But not a freak. If anything, you look more beautiful than ever. I'm saying that as your friend, and because I mean it." This has the effect of cheering your 18 foot tall and still growing friend up as she smiles and says, "Thanks, Ant! You're the best boy friend ever! I...guess I'm a little big for modesty now, aren't I? Besides, why should I deprive you of seeing the biggest set of tits in the world?" she teases and lets her arms down, giving you a sight male dreams were made of.

"Wait. Boyfriend?" you ask the virtual goddess in front of you, to which she smiles wider and says almost whimsically, "Oh, boy friend as in a friend who happens to be a boy... I didn't mean it the other way...unless you want it to, that is..."

You and Emily finally reach her place. She was just about as tall as the house now as her growth appears to stop for now at 20'8". You ask her, "Alright, we're here...though there's obviously no way you're gonna be able to fit inside. I think I'll go find Danielle and see if I can find out how we can stop this. She would be the one who would know the best, since she told you how to grow in the first place. Or did you want me to stay with you and try to help you explain this to your parents? I'd love to do both things at once, but I can't. The choice is yours."

Of course, you doubt she was done growing, and this is likely just a quick breather before her body grows again. If a solution wasn't found soon...you have a bad feeling she's going to start growing without pause, and that pace would quicken. And Emily always was a fickle one. Since she seems to be getting over the initial shock and embarrassment of her growth...she might not want to stop growing now.
12112111211211211112.title: It's no where near done, she keeps growing

choices: Lifts you up and plants a huge one right on your lips.
She grows again, this time a couple of feet.
1211211121121121112.content:
"She didn't believe me, and thought the picture was faked." you tell her sadly. Emily is shocked by this and you see tears beginning to well up in her eyes. " I can't believe my own mom didn't believe it." she says, tears starting to stream down her face. You realise this is a really low moment for her and you try to comfort her, ' Look, I can understand why. Maybe if we tell the principal you're having trouble remaining human sized, he'll let you go home and you can show your mother it was no lie." Emily nods in agreement, it seemed like a good idea.

It took some time getting Principal Robert Kelly to calm, the sight of your amazon friend startled him. " Are you sure she wasn't already this big when she got here?' he asked you. ' Sir, I think the school would have noticed if they had a 9 foot tall girl suddenly enroll, for instance, she would be on the basketball team, most of the girls look like six years old next to her, even some of the basketball girls!" you tell him and he agrees, realising that was a suestupid question.

" Do you know how this happened, I'm quite puzzled by your growth spurt, tall family perhaps?" he said. "No, I don't know, my family has been average, no one exceptionally tall or short." she says. " I think it would be best to let her go before she grows again, its a possibility." you tell him. Finally, Emily said, "Can we- like- get bigger?"

Danielle's grin grew even wider, and the hint of mischief in her eye swelled. She grabbed Emily's hand and pulled her in the direction of the destroyed school. In a few earth shaking steps, they were standing over the remains of the school building.
"Everything's way too small. . ." Danielle said to herself, craning her neck down and squinting at the rubble at her feet.

From her knee down was now a maimed pancake of mashed meat hanging uselessly from her thigh, and she was laying on the ground hoping not to be noticed and also hoping for someone to help her escape, as she could not do it herself.

She never really had a problem with Erin when she was normal sized, but now it didn’t matter, because she could do whatever she wanted. “So here’s what’s going to happen. If you don’t, well. . .” she giggled. “Let’s just say you don’t want to make me mad!” she finished with a smile. “Got it?” Without waiting for an answer, she lowered the poor trembling girl down back into the rubble and dropped her from about 10 feet up. Erin landed on her mangled limb, crying out in pain from the fall. It took her a moment to get her head straight. After all, this was a mind boggling experience for her. But after a moment, her survival instincts kicked in, and she realized that she had to find a tablet or she would be killed. And she knew from watching Danielle and Emily all day that these two monsters would have no problem doing just that, and probably in an extremely grisly manner. She scurried onto her hands and knees, dragging her limp leg along, trailing blood across the floor as she searched for the tablet.

After discarding her little envoy, Danielle stood back up to her full height. Emily had been watching the whole time, and when Danielle straightened she saw Emily looking at her, almost shaking in excitement.
“How was that?”
“Ooh! I can’t wait to get bigger,” Emily squealed. “How much bigger can we get?”
“I don’t know, I guess we have to look at the tablet and figure it out? I kind of just pressed a button earlier. . .”

Finally he was brought in front of her godlike face.
“Hi James!” she purred, smiling wickedly. He started to blabber something incoherent, which turned into a scream.
Ignoring him, she boomed, “I thought I gave you an order. Are you not going to obey me, James?”
He couldn’t form words. How could she expect him to form words? This was all happening so fast.
“Well then, James, you made the wrong choice!” And with that, she brought her thumb up to her forefinger and began to press. She pressed ever so gently to her, but knowing that at her size it would be more than enough to cause immense pain and suffering to the little mite.
James was in hell. His body felt like it was being compressed by a trash compactor. And on top of that her skin was smothering him, making him unable to breathe. He finally felt his ribs crack and break. Just when he thought he was going to pass out, she let up. She brought him back up to her eye and examined him.
James’ nose was bleeding, his arm was hanging loose from its socket and two of his ribs were sticking out of his abdomen, bleeding. He was in an indescribable amount of pain. Oh why did he have to invent those pills? And where did his daughter, his once sweet, sweet Danielle, go wrong? If it wasn’t for her none of this would be happening.
“I’ll give you one more chance to live little man. I know you have more pills. Where are they?”
James mustered all of the energy he had left and yelled “In the garage!”
Emily seemed to acknowledge what he said because she lowered him down in front of the still intact garage. “Get them.”
James hobbled in pain into the garage, opened his secret compartment behind the workbench and retrieved the rest of the pills. There were 3 more red and 3 more blue. He held them up as an offering to Emily. She lowered her pinky finger this time.
“Put them on.” And he discarded them onto her pinky finger. Immediately she rose to her full height, squealing in absolute joy and forgetting about James who was at her feet. She stood up so fast that he fell over, disoriented at her ridiculous size. Just when he thought she forgot about him, he saw her lean over and look back down at him between her breasts.
“Oh right, I almost forgot.” She bent over and plucked him up, this time not being nearly as gentle, brought him up to her mouth, and he screamed as he realized what was happening as she tossed him in. She chewed him up with a smile on her face, then forgot about him and focused on the pills.
1231221111211121221121121.title: She finds Danielle's father and tortures hi...

choices: She just ran out of time.
Someone heard Danielle and found it first.
She found it but it is broken.
1231221111211121222.content: Why doesn't she find it?
1231221111211121222.title: Erin doesn't find the tablet in time

choices: "My God, you're right! What have I done!?"
"Big words for such a tiny guy, Ant."
1231221111212.content:
*back to Ant's POV*
Upon hearing your name called by your giant redhead friend, you turn around and lock eyes with her. Looking into her eyes you see the Emily you knew, but with a hint of something new; you are pretty sure you know what that something is.
With an almost relieved grin, Emily squats down and reaches out to pluck you from the ground. You can't help but notice her gorgeous bare feet on your way up, even if they did bear a few scarlet blood splatters.

"Thank God I found you, Ant!" Emily says, giving you her irresistebly sweet smile. "I thought I would've killed you by accident!"
A wave of uneasiness strikes you as you notice the way she said that so casually.
"Uh, yeah, about that, Emily. Since when were you one to laugh at the suffering of others?" you ask, not wanting to aggravate her.
"Never, but as soon as I grew to this height, all I wanted to do was cause destruction. Maybe it's the lack of oxygen up here, haha." she chuckles. You cannot help but smile at the way Emily still has a cool head, but then you remember something she said before.
"So, uh, about before when you said any escapers would suffer a slow and painful death," you start nervously, "wasn't that a little... overly sadistic?"
Emily gives you a funny look and tilts her head. "I meant that, Ant. I may look the same, but I'm a changed person now."
Your brain cannot comprehend how a sweet, kind girl like Emily can suddenly transform into a power-hungry... well, monster, with only a change in size. Knowing you are treading on thin ice, you attempt to speak your mind.

"Look, Emily." you begin bravely. "Every single one of those blood splatters on you was once a person, just like you and I. He or she had a life of their own, with friends and family who cared about them. But because of you and Dani treating them like disposable playthings, their lives are... are... they're no more. Gone."
Emily looks impressed at your speech, and says...
1231221111212.title: Emily reaches down to pluck Ant from the ground.

choices: Emily is not so sure.
She says yes without hesitating. You attempt to escape.
12312211112122.content:
"Big words for such a tiny guy, Ant." Emily says, raising her eyebrows. You feel your stomach turn inside out at her new change of heart.
"W-what?" you stutter in disbelief, looking down for a second and remembering how high you are.
"We've already established that Dani and I are... above the rest of you, both in height and power.In other words, someone like you is insignificant compared to a goddess like me."
Your head spins and you feel sick to the stomach; Emily really has become corrupted by all this power. "But Em, I thought- I thought we were friends!"
"That was then, Ant. This is now. If you can't keep up with the needs of a 500ft tall girl like me, then you're just another pathetic tiny person to me."
"B-but-"
"Hey, Dani!" Emily interrupts. "I found Ant!"
"Ooh, I forgot about him in the midst of all this chaos!" she exclaims. "Let me see!"
"He's been trying to convince me to end our reign." she tells Dani. So the Emily you knew is gone, then.
"Eh, sounds like something he'd do. I say we should give hom the slow and painful death you promised, Em." she suggests.
"But wait!" you cut in.
"No talking! Now, what'll it be, Em...?"
12312211112122.title: "Big words for such a tiny guy, Ant."

choices: Emily sides with Ant
Dani convinces Emily to stay by her side
123122111121221.content:
"I'm... I'm not so sure." Emily admitted. "I was mostly talking without thinking."

"Really?" Dani asked. "Then why don't we come up with something together?"

That's sounds like a great idea!: Emily perked up. You couldn't believe what you were hearing. Emily, the girl you'd been best friends with since you were kids was going to kill you. A slow and painful death she promised.

"How about we stuff him down your chest?" Dani suggested.

"Nah! We did that already." Emily reminded.

You sat there in Emily's palm while both giants discussed the best way to kill you. Surprisingly enough you can't find the heart to be terrified anymore. You felt hallow inside, broken. As if you'd just lost an important part of your life. In a way you had. The Emily you knew was long gone... Dead.

"Butt crush?"

"Stomping?"

Panty stuffing?"

"Squeeze him with your fingers!"

Dani and Emily continued bouncing off ideas while you looked back and forth between the two. Eventually your eyes just settled on Dani. She did this. She caused this nightmare and killed your best friend. A new emotion consumed your thoughts. Anger, vengeance, hate! You wanted to kill her. To wring her neck and make her suffer for every life she took, but knew you couldn't.

This 'fake' Emily was right. You were just another pathetic tiny.

Your fists clenched so tight your knuckles were turning white. So tight that you actually drew blood. You felt so weak and helpless. You couldn't stop Dani and you couldn't save Emily from herself. You looked back up to your auburn haired friend with tears in your eyes. Damn it all she just couldn't be gone!

You thought back to all the years you spent together. Meeting her at the park when you were only ten, sneaking into R-rated movies, making fun of slut Suzy behind her back, failing to break her high score at pinball in the arcade off Blinker Street. Emily... the girl you 'loved' couldn't be dead!

"Ant! Ant! Hey, Ant! Pay attention when your goddess address you!" Dani's voice boomed. "We've reached a consensus and have decided to sentence you to a slow and painful death..."

"By digestion." Emily finished. The giantess's expected a reaction. Just not the one you gave them.

"It's not too late Emily." you said.

"Not this again!" Dani whined. "Emily is not you friend she is your goddess and she's about to smite you. Got it An-"

"BE QUIET!" you snapped. Dani was actually stunned. Even in your position you weren't afraid of her. "Emily this is wrong and you know it! Do you remember May 19, six years ago?"

You felt the giantess stiffen.

"That was the day -"

"Ant I'm warning you." Emily threatened.

"That was the day of your brother's funeral. I was there with you through that. Do you remember?" you asked.

Emily scowled. "Of course I remember."

"Do you remember what he used to do for a living. He was a doctor? He saved lives on the regular."

"Are you going somewhere with this?" Dani interrupted.

You ignored her. "I remember at his grave you made a promise. You said you were gonna be a doctor lke him and save lives. Do you remember?!"

Emily felt her body tremble as you spoke. She remembered that day very well. She remembered making that promise to him. She wanted to become a doctor like him and help people. But why? Why was Ant bringing this up now? "Yes. I remember."

"You wanted to make him so proud. You wanted him to watch over you when you made it happen. Well Emily. look around you. Look at the destruction you've caused. Look at your feet. Can you honestly tell me he would be proud of you?"

The giantess did just that. She looked at the ruin around her, down at her blood soaked soles. She then thought back to Ant's words earlier and how she'd responded. This... This was all wrong! This isn't her, was it? What would her brother say? It was at that point she started to break down in tears. He's be so ashamed of her.

Dani was what was happening as did you. The look on her face, the tears in her eyes, you'd finally gotten through. Dani was pissed. You were turning her on;y ally against her. She couldn't allow it. Wouldn't allow it.
123122111121221.title: Choices

choices: Emily and Dani duke it out while Ant searches for the tablet
The police arrive and begin to open fire on both the giants
Another student finds the tablet (Reader's Choice)
1231221111212211.content:
You couldn't help but smile when you saw the look on Emily's face. Though she was crying, that gleam in her eyes had vanished. There was no mania, no promises of death, no malicious intent of any kind, just the friend you used to know. The very same one who was starting to open her eyes and realize what she was doing.

She looked down at you with those watery eyes, those sad eyes that told you she was nothing but remorseful. She choked back a sob as she tried to speak, "A-Ant I..."

"You've said more than enough, Ant!" Danielle growled. Your eyes widened as you'd completely forgotten all about Danielle. You turned your head to see the angry giant reaching for you. On instinct you closed your eyes and awaited your doom... only for it to never come. Instead you felt your perch swing and the loud BOOM that followed.

"KEEP AWAY FROM HIM, YOU BITCH!"

Your eyes snapped open when you heard that. You could see Emily's palm was now a slightly closed fist. There was still enough of a gap between her fingers that you could make out the enraged look on her face. She... Protected you. You then looked through the other gaps and saw a sight that made your jaw drop. Instantly you put two and two together... Emily punched Dani.

The blonde giant was flat on her back holding nursing her right eye. You couldn't believe it. The unstoppable "goddess" Danielle was just stopped.

"E-Emily!?" You called.

Said girl opened her fist and stared at you with sadness. "A-Ant. I-I'm sorry. I'm so, so sorry! I-I don't know what came over me, I-I..."

"It's alright." You said to the sobbing giant. "It's alright. I... Forgive you."

Hearing that was almost too much for the giantess as she began to break down. How could you forgive her after everything she did? She killed people! She was going to kill you! How did you not hate her!?"

"You traitor!" Danielle shouted as she sat up. The way she squinted her eye told you that was going to leave a mark. She then set her sights on you. The absolute hatred that burned in them for you specifically made you gulp. "You! You did this! I'm gonna kill you... ANT!"

"Crap." You whimpered.

"Listen to me ant. Danielle was able to grow us because of a tablet her dad invented. Find it in the rubble. If you do you might be able to shrink her down. Got it!?" Explained.

You had no clue what was going on but nodded all the same. "What does it look like?"

"Trust me, you can't miss it." Emily smiled before placing you on the ground. You then made a mad dash to the remains of the school to begin your search.

"Be careful." You shouted.

Emily nodded before turning her attention to the now standing Dani. The blonde was beyond pissed now. She'd heard everything and wasn't about to let you find that tablet. The only thing standing between her and you, was Emily. "Move!"

"No chance!" Emily snarled. She then began to crack her knuckles.

"When I'm finished with you, Ant's next."

Emily grit her teeth, addressing the remaining tinies. "Clear a path everyone! It's about to go down over here!"

The survivors didn't need to be told twice.
1231221111212211.title: The Power of Friendship

choices: Danielle issues a decree.
Emily makes a wall around the blacktop.
1231222.content:
"I don't know... it just doesn't seem right," Emily says slowly, eyes glued on her classmates.
"Doesn't seem right or doesn't seem fair?" Danielle rejoins, eyeing her friend and temporarily ignoring the screaming crowds below.
"Neither, and I think you should change us back. Maybe if we turn ourselves in right off the bat they won't get us in as much trouble."

"Don't you get it? We can never go back now, they'll never let us go! It's this or we stay on the run for the rest of our lives, which is simply ridiculous. We're practically above the law now, and in the least above everyone else literally. Or..." the titaness talked as quietly as she could manage, directly into the redhead's ear: "Or we can make sure there aren't any witnesses left to tell, and then we go back to being regular sized, if we can find some antidote tablets from my dad's laboratory. Then everything can go back to the way it was."

Her logic was hard to deny, Emily admitted in her mind. The veil of innocence for both of them had vanished; they were wanted women. So far the only advantage she saw was the curse itself; she was five hundred feet tall... apparently some people actually were above the law. From this they could forge themselves as goddesses over the school, as long as they could contain this little incident as soon as possible.

Emily noticed that a small group of kids she used to know had almost reached the fence of the school's border... no, she couldn't let them out. Taking a sizeable step forward, the crunch of asphalt beneath her shoes marked her passaged to the edge. Swinging her other foot ahead, she crushed the kids beneath her flip-flops before they had a chance to scream their last words. It still didn't feel good, but her conscience had backed off for now.
1231222.title: Above The Law

choices: "It's a good idea, I guess."
"Are you obsessed with stomping people!?"
12312221.content:
Danielle pats Emily on the back, beaming with pride. "That's the way to do it!" she says. Emily froms slightly at this.
"Hold on, I have an idea!" Danielle announces. "Does it involve killing anyone else?" Emily retorts, crushing a potential witness reluctantly.
"It might do." Danielle replies. Emily simply sighs at her friend's sadistic desires. "What is it then?"
Danielle clears her throat. "Attention, tiny people!" she booms. "We are above the law; we now own this place!" Emily facepalms. "I hereby issue a royal decree: any escapers from this area will be stepped on!" Danielle continues, trying to sound powerful. She steps on a terrified guy running for his life.
"That guy was a great example!" she says, beaming.
"Well, what do you think, Em?" Danielle asks.
12312221.title: We now own this place!

choices: Emily must enforce the law; no one can leave.
Danielle demolishes more of the school.
123122212.content:
"Are you obsessed with stomping people!?" Emily asks incredulously, growing weary of her friends antics.
"Sort of," Danielle says, voice laden with barely-concealed guilt. "But the power... it feels so good! Don't you feel it?
Emily shook her head, having not really felt very different, aside from the fact that she was now a little under a hundred times taller. She took a moment to look at her hands in front of her face, realizing that there was now an optical distortion between the landscape all around her and her own gigantic size. It almost seemed as if all was normal again... until she looked down. The people were still ant-sized alright... the various bloodstains were evidence of this too. Her heart was suddenly seized with great pity, but she forced herself to shrug it off. It was time to get cold.

You can't believe your ears. Danielle was already taking all of this size madness straight to her head. After issuing a decree that she and Emily were in charge now, she had stomped a man into dust in cold blood. What a rapid change from the merry and kind girl you had known beforehand? This revealed a whole new side to the new giantess, one you were running the opposite direction from. The second of the pair, though, Emily had seemed like a promising candidate for aid from... but now she had been sucked into the power trip as well. Your burning lungs permit a soft sigh as you dash away, struggling with the thick crowd to move forward. You would think that with all of this cattering there would have been several gaps for you to slip through. The booming laughter of Danielle sounds from overhead, but you never look back.
123122212.title: Power Trip

choices: Regretful guilt
Slight amusement
1231222121.content:
Freedom is in your sights! The gate has been ripped off from it's hinges in front of you, probably by the fleeing crowd. You hear more demented cackling from Danielle, who seems to be enjoying tormenting the school.
Suddenly, you are brought to a skidding halt as a colossal flip-flopped foot crashes down in front of you, reducing about 45 people to powder with a sickening crunch. Your gateway to freedom is now blocked by a huge foot and a gruesome pile of deformed corpses. How lucky you were to have avoided this fate, you think, holding your nose as the stench of blood disturbs it.
You crane your neck and look to the skies, noticing Emily's ever-looming face high above you, and Danielle kicking over the Maths block in the corner of your eye. Emily brings her foot down onto another fleeing group of terrified people. You see that her expression when doing this is...
1231222121.title: Doomsday

choices: Sit by your friend Emily, and maybe find out about earlier...
Sit by Krystal, and maybe get to know her better...
Sit by yourself, and see what happens...
125.content:
You don't feel like getting involved with their shenanigans today, so you turn around and head to your first class. On your way to class you bump into someone.
"ouch"
"Oh... uh... sorry!"
You look down to see a girl who looks like she should still be in elementary school from her size.
"That's quite alright" you say to her as you gather up the things you dropped.
"My name is Anthony... or Ant... Whats yours?"
"M... My name is Krystal... I'm new here... Uh... Do you know where the Science class is?"
"I do. I can take you to it if you want, I am heading there myself."
"Can you? Thanks so much!"

As you walk to class you kinda get a idea of what Krystal is like. She is only 4 foot 6 at the most and is as flat as a board. She seems friendly while at the same time she is incredibly quiet. She stays be your side on the whole trip to class. You begin to wonder if she has many friends. Maybe you could be her first friend at school.

You arrive at science class and go in. Krystal immediately heads to the farthest corner of the classroom and sits down. You also see Emily at the back of the room, at the table next to where Krystal is sitting.

You see Suzy here as well... Great... she is glaring at you, probably thinking of ways to make your life miserable. It best that you avoid her.

Where will you sit?
125.title: You turn back, having second thoughts about it.

choices: Runs to the bathroom crying
Starts to grow/shrink (your choice)
Sat quietly until end of class, where she confronts Emily and Suzy
1252.content:
You walk over by Krystal and take your seat. She glances over at you and smiles slightly then immediately looks away. You feel Emily glaring at you because you didn't sit with her.

The Science Teacher walks in
"Alright class, look at who ever is sitting at your desk, they are your partner today. We will be learning about mass and matter. The papers are in your desk, now get to work! Suzy, you will be working with Emily today, since neither of you have someone at your table." With that, the teacher sat at his desk and started reading a science magazine.

"Emily is gonna hate me..." you mumble.
Krystal pulls out all the papers
"he gave us a book... We have have to complete the whole book..." She says sadly
"A whole book of work on mass and matter? Well, looks like we are gonna be here for a while..."
As the class went on, you and Krystal started into the chemical mixing part of the work, adding various chemicals to some sort of liquid.
While you are moving your chemical mix to another part of the table, Emily leans over and gives you a nudge, causing the chemical mix to spill all over Krystal. Krystal sat there, stunned. All the while, not one class member or the teacher other than Suzy, Emily and you saw what happened.
"That's what you get for ditching me and forcing me to team up with Suzy" Whispered Emily

Meanwhile Krystal...
1252.title: Sit by Krystal, and maybe get to know her better..

choices: Krystal crawls out of the bathroom on hands and knees, 15 feet tall and naked
A giant, rapidly growing bare foot shoots out of the bathroom door
12521.content:
Krystal bottom lip started trembling. Tears welled in her eyes and before you could say anything, she leapt out of her seat and ran to the front of the class.

“Miss…” the teacher began, but Krystal had already bolted out the door.

As the door shut behind her, you could hear tennis shoes running down the tile hallway, along with what sounded like sobs. The teacher turned to you. “Anthony, what happened?”

You shot Emily a dirty look. “Um, we accidentally spilled some chemicals, Mr. Tomball,” you said. “Some got on Krystal.”

Mr. Tomball looked concerned. “We have a rinse station in here. Did any get on her skin?”

You were pretty sure some had, but Tomball didn’t need to know that. “I don’t think so. Just her clothes.”

“Ah, well, she’ll be fine then. The worst this will do is bleach her clothes. You can work with Donnie and Rochelle until your partner gets back.”

You scowled at Emily again as you moved your stool over to Donnie and Rochelle’s bench, then got to work with them.

The rest of the class passed uneventfully, though Krystal never returned. You, Donnie, and Rochelle finished early, so when the bell rang you were one of the first out the door. Then you stood by the entrance to the room, waiting for Emily to leave.

Finally you saw Emily and pounced on her. “What the hell was that about?!”

Emily frowned. “You know perfectly well! You made me have to partner with that slut Suzy! Not to mention just walking out on me and Danielle this morning when we were trying to talk to you!”

You and Emily were walking down the hall at this point, on the way to your next class. “OK, first, you were acting really weird this morning. Second, Krystal is new here. This is her first day and she doesn’t have any friends yet. I thought I could help her out. You probably just made things harder for her by embarrassing her in front of the whole class!”

Emily’s frown went from belligerent to regretful. “I-I didn’t know that,” she said sheepishly. “I thought you were just blowing me off. And Krystal never came back?”

“No,” you said, the anger subsiding. “And I don’t know where she ran off to.”

“I’ll check the ladies’ room,” Emily said eagerly. “Start to make it up to her. And you.” With that, Emily turned smartly on her heel and stepped into the girls’ restroom you had just passed.

You took up a spot against the wall a few doors down and across from the girls’ room, waiting for Emily to report back.

Emily was in the restroom a long time. Maybe she had to go herself? You were just pulling out your phone to text her when a loud crash came from the bathroom, then a rumbling shook the hallway.

“What the hell…” you muttered.

A small crowd was gathering around the bathroom door when a group of terrified looking girls ran out. Emily was among them, but Krystal was not.

Emily ran up to you and grabbed your arm, eyes wide. “Ant! I-it’s-I mean, s-she’s, she- We gotta-!”

“Whoa, slow down.” Emily was barely coherent, tripping over her words. “What’s going on?”

You got your answer a second later.
12521.title: Krystal Flees

choices: Crying
Laughing
125212.content:
Emily was still trying to drag you down the hall when another loud rumble came from the bathroom. A second later, the door’s hinges blew with a loud bang, and the door fell to ground. The same instant, the girl who had forced the door open against its hinges emerged from the bathroom.

Or rather, the girl’s foot emerged from the bathroom.

Your jaw dropped as an enormous foot, almost tall as you, just…just grew out of the bathroom, visibly expanding before your eyes. The toes flexed and wiggled as they ballooned larger, growing longer and thicker by the second.

“What the hell?! Who is that?!” You demanded, not taking your eyes off the surreal spectacle in front of you. The tip of the giant’s big toe was now a foot above your head, and still getting bigger. “What happened to her?” You were confident that the foot belonged to a girl, at least. Growing out of the girls’ bathroom was a pretty good clue, and the pale skin of the continuously lengthening, thickening leg that was pushing the foot farther and farther into the hall was shaved smooth.

Emily didn’t answer. She just stared. “Oh, my god, she’s getting even bigger…” she whispered.

Most students had by now fled the hallway. The foot continued swelling larger and larger, protruding farther into the hallway, and by now was more than twice the size it had been when it erupted into the hall. The girl scrunched her toes as they grew into the ceiling, but she was still growing. Ceiling tile and wiring was torn out in a widening gash as her foot and toes expanded.

In less than a minute, the girl’s leg stretched the entire width of the hallway. Her expanding knee flexed and cracked the bathroom doorframe, and the girl bent her ankle as her foot pressed against far wall. The wall was holding against the pressure for now, but groans and cracks in the structure suggested that wasn’t going to last.

However, before the foot could explode through the wall into the classroom beyond, the unnatural growth spurt seemed to cease. The foot was no longer visibly expanding, and the leg stopped pushing quite so hard against the far wall. The girl’s foot towered over everything in the hallway. Her heel rested on the floor, but her toes were no longer visible, disappeared into the ceiling.

You turned to Emily. “Who is that?!” You repeated.

Emily faced you, turning away from the giant’s leg. “It’s Krystal!” she wailed. “She was in a stall, crying, and…and she was growing!” Emily was nearly hysterical. “She was begging people to help her, b-but no one knew what to do. When she out- outgrew the stall, everyone freaked and ran out.”

“Krystal?!” you cried, shocked. Then it dawned on you “Those chemicals! The ones that spilled on her in science class! What the hell were they?”

Another rumble came from the bathroom. You and Emily braced yourselves for another growth spurt, but none came. Just the building settling. You paled. Or Krystal knocking down a wall. That got you thinking: where was her other leg? Just how big was she?

“Krystal probably needs help.” You said. “And she might be hurt. I’m gonna see what I can do.” You started walking toward the bathroom door. There was a small crack between Krystal’s leg and the door frame that you thought you could squeeze through. As you got closer, you heard Krystal…
125212.title: Outgrowing the bathroom, feet first

choices: “Anthony, get out of here! I’m growing again!”
“The roof is breaking apart over the lab! I think someone else is growing!"
1252121.content:
As you approached the door you could hear sounds coming from the bathroom. As you advanced, the background chatter of the excited and nervous crowd around you died down to tense whispers as people watched you approach the door and the giant leg. It was then that the sound became clear. Sobbing.

You shot another glare at Emily, but then your face softened. She couldn’t possibly have known this would happen.

You turned back to where Krystal’s leg was spilling out from the bathroom. “Krystal?” You called cautiously.

There was no reply except the steady sound of sobbing. You came up to the ruined doorway and gently placed a hand on the enormous leg. “Krystal?”

Krystal’s leg twitched under your touch, but she didn’t seem to take any more notice of you than that. Sighing, you started wriggling through the small gap between Krystal’s leg and the wall. You had to scramble onto the giant’s knee and suck in your gut a little, but you made it into the bathroom without incident. What you saw in there blew you away.

“Hoooly shit...,” you muttered.

As you entered the bathroom, you found yourself surrounded by impossible walls of flesh. On either side of you were Krystal’s thighs, rising up to your height. One leg stretched through the bathroom door, while the other had broken down the wall behind the bathroom sinks, and now stretched across an empty classroom, desks strewn across the room. And in front of you…

You blushed. In front of you was a pussy that could have swallowed your entire upper body, framed by dark wispy hair. Above it, a soft, pale stomach the size of a garage door convulsed with sobs. You swallowed and took in the rest of Krystal. She was doubled over, trying to stay within the building, and two enormous breasts hung over your head. Each one had to weigh more than you! Hell, they might have weighed more than your car. You stared mesmerized as they swayed and bounced as Krystal wept and shook. Where had those come from? Krystal had been flat as a board before she grew. Evidently the chemicals didn’t just affect her height.

You jerked your gaze away from those incredible tits and to Krystal’s face. Her cute, delicate features were currently distorted into a look of terror and despair. Her eyes were scrunched closed, but great tears welled out, and splashed on the broken tile floor of the bathroom. Her long brown hair hung down, matted with debris from where she had broken through the ceiling into the second floor hallway above.

Krystal was bent over considerably. Even so, her back and head were protruding into the second floor above. It looked like if she straightened out she’d go through the roof.

“Krystal!” You called, trying to get her attention once more. The crying giantess ignored you. “KRYSTAL!”

Krystal’s eyes slowly opened. Her eyes were red and her gaze was watery, but you saw recognition flash through them. “A-Anthony?” Then her eyes abruptly widened as she realized everything that you were getting an eyeful of. She gasped and brought an arm up to her chest and snapped her legs together.

You realized what was happening with only a second to cry out. “Krystal! Wai-MMMPH!” But her thighs closed around you before you could get much more protest out than that.

“Omigosh! Anthony!” Krystal parted her legs, allowing you to breathe, and slipped a hand down between them to cover herself. “I’m so sorry! It was just a reflex!” she said, as you stood, dazed, trying to catch your breath.

Fortunately, Krystal’s thighs were thick and soft. If you’d had been between her knees, or if Krystal worked out more, it might have been a different story, but you had only had the wind knocked out of you. A little gentler, you thought, and the whole experience would be pretty pleasant. Krystal’s body felt good.

“I-I’m OK,” you assured her. “A-are you?” It seemed a stupid question, but you couldn’t think of anything else to ask.

Krystal’s lip trembled, and tears welled in her eyes. “I don’t know what’s happening to me!” she wailed. “I ran in here after chemistry class, and just started…started growing! I couldn’t control it! I’m a freak! A monster! I’m destroying the school on my first day!” She took a deep breath and looked down at you piteously. “I haven’t hurt anyone, have I?”

“No, no,” you told her. “Everyone’s fine.” As far as I know, you thought, but kept that to yourself. “What about you? Are you hurt? Can you move?”

“I-I’m fine, but if I move, I’ll cause even more damage! I’m already about to go through the roof!”

You ran a hand through your hair nervously. “I don’t think there’s any way around that at this point,” you told her. “And we should probably get you out of the building.”

Krystal looked down at you, past her new and improved and extremely impressive chest, fear in her eyes. “What’s going to happen to me?”

“I don’t know,” you replied honestly. “But I’ll help however I can.”

Krystal gave you a small, shy smile. “Thanks, Anthony. You don’t know how much that means to me.” She sniffled, and her eyes grew watery again. “I’ve, uh, never really had much in the way of friends before. I never thought I’d be in a situation like this, but now that I am, I, um, I’m glad I have someone I can count on.” Her grin grew a little wider. “OK.” Krystal took a deep breath. “Let’s try to get out of here.”

Slowly, the giant girl started straightening her back. Her head quickly ran out of room, connecting with the second floor ceiling. Krystal grimaced and kept rising, her head easily tearing through the dropped-panel ceiling.

You watched her continue to straighten, and her shoulders cut a widening hole through the ceiling. Finally, you saw sunlight pour through, framing Krystal’s upper body with a golden halo. She had cleared the roof.

Krystal finally sat up straight. Between the multiple ceilings between you and her head, not to mention her mountainous tits, you had lost sight of her face. “Krystal!” You called up. “Are you OK? How’s it look?”

“Anthony…” Krystal’s voice was strained. It sounded like she was choking back tears again. “There’re a lot of people out here…”

“It’ll be fine!” You called back. “You just need-“ A sudden tremor sent you falling on your ass and interrupted you. You scrambled back to your feet, but the shaking continued, growing worse. You placed an arm of Krystal’s thigh to steady yourself, and called back up. “What the hell is that?!”

Krystal sounded scared as she replied…
1252121.title: Reluctant Giantess

choices: “…it’s the red head that spilled the chemicals on me.” (Emily)
“…it’s that tall blonde who spent class glowering at us.” (Suzy)
12521212.content:
“The roof is breaking apart over the science lab!” Krystal sounded scared. “I-I think someone else is outgrowing the school!”

“What?!” You pressed yourself tighter against Krystal’s leg. “That’s impossible!” But the shaking and the clamor was growing worse. It definitely did sound like the building was coming apart.

“I’m telling you, Anthony, someone’s growing through the roof! I can see hair!”

You grimaced. Someone else must have stumbled upon the same chemicals that had spilled on Krystal in lab. Or maybe it hadn’t been an accident. Maybe someone had seen the chemicals spill on Krystal, saw her current size, and had put two and two together. The only people besides you and Krystal who had seen it were Emily and…

Oh shit.

Suzy.

Your stomach dropped. If that sadistic bitch grew into a giant… “Can you tell who it is? Who’s growing?”

“I-I don’t know her name! But…”
12521212.title: Growing Company

choices: Take your chances and climb over Suzy's feet
Play it safe and look for another way out
125212122.content:
“Her head just cleared the roof! It-It’s that blonde girl from science class! The red head girl’s partner? The tall one, who spent all of class scowling at us.”

You felt the color drain from your face. Suzy. The vicious girl had always been tall, but if Krystal was right, now she was bigger than a building. The sadistic bully, who took no end of pleasure in causing you and everyone else pain and suffering, was now one of the two most powerful people on the planet.

That’s when you heard it, almost in response to your thoughts. Laughter. Over the sounds of destruction and the collapsing building, someone- some girl- was having an uproariously good time. Your blood ran cold at the sound. Definitely Suzy.

“Crapcrapcrapcrap!” You were wailing to no one in particular. “It’s Suzy!” you yelled up at Krystal. “She’s a Grade-A bitch and an unrepentant bully! If she’s ten times bigger than everyone else we’re in deep trouble! I’m in deep trouble! She hates me! How big is she?

“Uh, her shoulders just cleared the roof. And, Anthony? She really seems to be enjoying this.”

No kidding. The ominous laughter was growing louder and deeper as its source increased in size. “But she’s still smaller than you, right?”

“Umm, yeah, if she’s currently standing up right now. But she’s growing really fast. Her boobs just knocked apart the roof.”

Shit. For a second you considered telling Krystal that she should attack Suzy right now while she still had the size advantage. Beat down Suzy before she turned her cruel attention to victims who would be smaller than her foot. Like you. You quickly abandoned that notion, though. Even though you hadn’t known Krystal for very long, it was clear she wasn’t a fighter.

OK, fight was out. Flight it was.

“We gotta get out of here!” you yelled at Krystal. “Climb out of the school while you still have the size advantage and Suzy’s still distracted and enamored with her own growth!” You were already climbing through the hole back into the hallway. “I’ll meet you outside!”

“Where?” The building’s tremors grew more severe as Krystal started to climb to her very large feet.

Despite everything, you could have facepalmed. “I’ll find you! You’re hard to miss!”

“Oh, right,” Krystal said sheepishly.

You sprinted down the hallway, desperate to get away before Suzy decided she was big enough to start doling out punishment.

The school continued to shake as the two giantesses made their respective ways out of the building. As you dodged around fallen lockers and collapsing ceiling panels, you realized that the hallways and classrooms were empty. Everyone must have cleared the building to leave it to the two girls.

You turned a corner onto the hallway by the science lab. You thought about peaking in to check Suzy’s progress (and yes, to catch a glimpse of her naked. Suzy might be a bitch, but she was still smoking hot), but quickly suppressed the urge. Would probably only see her shins by this point anyway.

You were jogging down the hallway, almost to the exit, when something exploded from the wall to your right. “Holy shit!” You swerved to avoid the explosion of plaster, brick, and…toes?

“Jesus Christ!” You skidded to a halt as an enormous bare foot, more than twice your size, knocked over the wall separating the hallway and the science lab. Another foot tore through the wall a few yards down the hall. You feared that Suzy had started kicking apart the school for shits and giggles, but then you realized that she hadn’t moved. Her feet had just grown through the wall as she stood, still laughing. You watched, horrified and awed, as Suzy’s toes and soles expanded over the rubble strewn floor. Krystal was right, Suzy was growing fast. By now her big toe looked like it was about 3 feet long, and Suzy was still growing, her toes swelling like absurd balloons.

The floor shook as Suzy wiggled her boulder-sized toes with a loud giggle, and you had to steady yourself on the wall to keep your balance. Absurdly, the thought you kept coming back to, probably because her feet dominated your vision, was that Suzy wasn’t wearing her customary violet nail polish, then you realized that she probably hadn’t applied enough last night or whenever to cover nails the size of manhole covers.

The hallway shook again as Suzy’s foot ran into the wall on the left side of the hall. The giantess scrunched her toes as they started punching through the wall, digging deep furrows in the tile floor.

Frantically, you tried to estimate Suzy’s size. You guessed that about half her foot spanned the 10 foot hallway. The rest, back to her heel, was still wreaking havoc back in the science lab. So her feet were roughly 20 feet long. Suzy had been a pretty big girl even before she went through the ceiling, with a shoe size to match, so say her feet were 1 foot long before her growth spurt. Suzy had been 6’5’’ before, so you did some math in your head and figured that Suzy was now in the neighborhood of 130 feet tall.

“Oh, shit.” You shuddered. And Suzy was still growing! You had to take a step back as her swelling, widening foot encroached on where you were standing.

You worried about Krystal. You figured Suzy by now was at least 50 feet taller than the timid girl. At least Suzy hadn’t gone anywhere yet, hopefully letting Krystal get some distance. Suzy was likely getting off on the terror she was no-doubt evoking in the crowd outside, as well as the fact that she was destroying the school just by letting her body swell larger and larger.

Then you realized you had a more immediate concern: Suzy’s feet were cutting you off from the exit. By now her toes had completely disappeared into the room across the hall, and just the shortest part of her foot was rising up past your knees. The shortest path to the exit was past Suzy’s continually expanding feet. You could still climb over them, but what if Suzy noticed you? You could also still backtrack to another exit, but who knew how big Suzy would be by the time you got out?
125212122.title: Expanding Nightmare

choices: Suzy's growth finally slows down
Suzy never does things halfway, she grows even larger
1252121221.content:
Selecting between those options is in your opinion like choosing between pest and cholera. But the speed of her growth convinces you that you simply don’t have the time to search for an alternative escape route. You take a leap of faith and storm forward, determined to get out of this building as fast as possible. The risk of drawing Suzy’s attention is hanging above you like the sword of Damocles as you start climb her huge –growing – feet. Silently praying the constant rain of plaster on her leg and the sheer number of sensations caused by her body overwhelming the school-building from within would mask the touch of your comparatively insignificantly small body you feel Suzy’s velvet skin expand beneath your touch at a still alarmingly fast rare. Finally passing the blocked doorway you slide of Suzy’s arch of foot, the impact draining the air from you lungs. Painfully aware you cannot afford to lose time, you dash forward overtaking the large feet and sculpted legs, which relentlessly ploughed their way through the school with unstoppable force. They are incredibly huge… You hardly notice the uproar, caused by panicked students and the destructive force of Suzie’s gargantuan body. Your eyes shoot forward and back in the suddenly quite cramped hallway and see her other perfectly shaped leg elongating and growing further, filling up the entirety of the parallel floor. You close your eyes, shake your head and look again…You have to get out of here – fast!

Sport has never been your favourite activity, but the sheer terror you feel, spurs you to peak performance. Hastily you traverse the entirety of the sprawling hallway until you reach the main entrance in record time, despite all the rubble and obstacles the mass of fleeing students had left in their wake. Unwilling to stop to soon you run further, until a violent tremble of the ground unbalances you. Crawling on all fours on the main street, breathing heavily the adrenalin flooding your body slightly abates. Regaining your senses, the groan and creak of straining metal and splitting concrete turn your attention back to the school; and you freeze on the spot.
Finally you secret wish of seeing Suzy naked was fulfilled, but in a way you have never dared to dream off. The whole building was now fully stuffed with a gargantuan female body. Well, it was actually beyond this point. By now, Suzy's monumental breasts had not only brought down large sections of the school’s roof, they actually had risen to quite some distance above it remains. They gently sway in all their splendid glory. The look on Suzy’s beautiful face betrays she close to coming and you watch in fascination the contortions of her beautiful face, caught between arousal and unbelievable fear, when you realise that she had actually freed her hands of the confinement of the outgrown building, but had actually reached back in with her huge right hand into a region where you suspect the glistening pink folds of her womanhood are, still hidden by crumbling walls. As you had expected, Suzy is revelling in her changes, instead of being shocked like Krystal.

Her still growing body fills the large school-building to capacity, her torso alone now larger than the building itself, and the sidewalls starts to buckle and crack… Finally her still growing body extends in width past the school, her belly button approximately at the point her breasts had been, when you had stumbled, the walls explode outwards, turning into dust clouds and flying debris, the rest of the building caves in.

Suddenly you become aware of a new crashing sound. Left and right of you, the one-story thick legs clear across the street, while the right one was ploughs a clearing through the school parking lot, with consummate ease, the left breaks through a house front. Windows shatter like you faint hope that Krystal would be able to face Suzy. The blonde behemoth dwarves the smaller giantess by far and she still was growing.

Suzy had broken for the nearest exit after seeing what had happened to Krystal. Others were running the other way to see what the commotion was, but Suzy had seen enough and was on her way to her car to get out of the area.
