"I ran in here after chemistry class, and just started... started growing!"

Suzy stopped. Krystal... the chemicals... her growth... Could it be?

Suzy turned around and ran back to the chemistry class. It was fortunately empty since everyone including Mr. Tomball were preoccupied with Krystal's situation. Suzy looked over the beakers on the counter along the room's perimeter looking for the one that Ant and Krystal had used. Everyone had the same assignment and so all of the beakers looked similar, but Suzy found only one that was just a little less full than the others and had traces of its contents on the rim, which was the one that had spilled on Krystal.

Suzy then...

You just stand there unsure of how to react. She's angry.
13.content:
...Miss Blake, your biology teacher for fourth period. This is straying from the normal passage of things - she never really talked to you outside of class except for once when you needed a hall pass after being late from helping another teacher. What could she possibly want, you think, kowing your grades were in order. After all, she favored you out of the rest of your class, mainly because she saw you as a promising student in the biology field.
"Ant, wait up a moment. Uh, I'm not sure how to explain this, but I have to show you something."
"But I'll be late, Miss Blake, can this wait until --"
"No, not really. I'll get you excused from class, just follow me!" She calls, taking your arm.

Well, this wouldn't be so bad; interesting probably. Not only did you like her as a teacher, but you had developed a crush on her at the beginning of the year. Her talents hadn't all been squandered on brains; she was gorgeous as well. You wondered how she was still single even at her young age, but decide that's really not your business at all. You can't help but catch her feet out of your peripherals. She was wearing stilettos as usual. Not exactly work dress, but it was a casual day for teachers on Mondays. A slight shiver rus up your spine, but your fight back the arousment and focus on the door that Miss Balke was briskly leading you to. Once inside, you are in awe to find that this room didn't even look like it was part of the school. Your attractive teacher shuts the door behind you, then pulls you aside, looking into your eyes.

"Listen, I don't have much time. Something went wrong in one of my personal labs today, and since I don't have a chance at getting an actual biologist to help me out, you're my last hope. Don't be worried though, just do your best using the directions I'll give to you," she explains, handing you a packet of perused instructions. You look down at them blankly, wondering aloud why she chose you.
"Ant, you are undoubtedly my best student... it's better now that I tell you than when the others are around. Now please, help me out and believe me, it'll be worth your while. So look at the first part, quick, it's already starting to affect me," Miss Blake urges with strain in her voice.
13.title: Pulled Aside

133.content:
"Step 1: Empty 250g of CuO into a beaker, and heat it for 30 seconds with 10g of K."
"Miss Blake, what's CuO and what is K?" you ask. "Also, how do I measure them?"
Miss Blake passes you two tubs: one marked 'Copper Oxide', and one marked 'Potassium'. "Don't worry about measuring them... just do it." Miss Blake says weakly, collapsing to the floor and still sweating.
You comply, mixing the two together and heating them over a bunsen burner that happened to be alight, probably from Miss Blake's earlier experiment.
The two powders start to jump about inside the test tube and eventually form a clear liquid giving off a red vapour.
"Step 2: Pour the product into a beaker and add a handful of magnesium shavings."
You grab a nearby pot and tip a bunch of shavings into the beaker. It starts to fizz wildly and the shavings are dissolved almost immediately.
Shaking, you hand the beaker to the weak Miss Blake, who quickly snatches it and drinks it down with a shudder. "That stuff tastes horrid." she exclaims, grimacing. You wait for a result...

...only to be met with another surprise in the next instant. Instead of the gratitiude or recovery you were waiting for, she stumbled backward, arms limp at her sides. She landed in a slump at the corner of the back wall, a a grimace on her face either from the taste or from something going on below the surface - possibly even both combined. You're starting to get worried now, and something smells (not literally) illegal about all of this, and you regret being dragged into it. Still, this was a teacher who had trusted you enough and was someone you would even call your friend, to a reasonable extent. The least you could do was lend a hand for her when she was in need, you justify, rushing to her aid.

Miss Blake's face was exceedingly pallid, like a more advanced version of the kind that she had earlier before drinking the stuff you made. Why she couldn't have mixed that herself was still beyond you, but she must have had a real reason or else the teacher wouldn't have had to risk letting you in on all this. Her entire body shook with intensity, causing you to reflexively withdraw your hand from reaching out to her, but she doesn't seem to notice that. All of a sudden she drops the beaker, letting it shatter on the floor from the impact and causing you to jump back. The weirdest of all happened next though; her hair started to shift through a transition of luminescent colors, then it ended as soon as it all began.

"No! I'm not just going to leave you like this!" you reply.
"Ant! You don't understand! There could be... side effects!" she exclaims, hurriedly. Suddenly, her trousers begin to tear a little and become frayed at the ends. A few buttons pop off her shirt. The heels collapse on her stilettos. She hits her head on the low ceiling!
"I'm growing!" she shouts, stating the obvious. Her ripped shirt exposes her bra which seems to be growing with her. "Get out! I don't know if I will be the same when I stop growing!" she yelps, bending over.

But suddenly, Miss Blake screams and stops growing at about 14 feet tall. Her clothes have ripped off but her underwear grew with her, apparently. Miss Blake opens her eyes and looks at you, and you see...

133321.content:
...Miss Blake, looking unchanged in the face but radically different in size. In fact, you rub your eyes repeatedly to make sure you were seeing things correctly. As you had deep down suspected, they werem't lying to you; your teacher had more than doubled in size within those few moments. Her face pleads with you, but all you can do is stare dumbfounded at her, letting the instructions drift to the floor. Had you failed her in perfecting that solution, or was the growth inevitale and this was Miss Blake's last ditch effort of some kind? Overwhelming guilt washes over you, even though a niche in the back of your mind pointed at the woman herself. But you aren't even positive that she did do this to herself, were you?

Soon enough the situation was out of both pairs of hands. You start to put together a theory on why the clothes were still retaining their size along with her as she suddenly experiences yet another growth spurt, and this one sends her head plowing through the ceiling as if it were made of cotton candy instead of sheetrock. She seems relatively unharmed except for the pain that was caused by her rearranging structure. Each burst is relatively quick, though, but this one has been the worst of all. Your biologist mentor is now over thirty feet in height, with body size in ratio with that. Having once stood at about 5'10" or 5'11", she leaves her prior stature (and your current one) dwarfed by comparison.

You gulp; a harsh rock that hurts your throat. Her panic has only grown more feverish, and she calls out to you in despiar:
"Ant, something's wrong! I knew there would be adverse effects on my body structure, but nothing like this!" her voice muffled.
"Well, let's get to the bottom of this; how did this happen to you," you ask, trying to stay calm for her benefit.
"This isn't the time, just help me again. On the back of those instructions it details another possible antidote that I've written up in case this happened. "Quick, leaf through and find it!" She demands, tightening her fingers' grip on the crumbling room.
133321.title: Another Growth Spurt

1333211.content:
Even if you had been able to break free of your panic in order to help her, it was out of your hands now. Whatever Miss Blake had done to herself worked much faster than her potential antidote had, and you see her face become a sheet of unnatural white. Much more quickly than you would have thought possible, her body erupts to a much larger size, giving her over over ten times the height in an instant. It seemed so abrupt, tather than the gradual growth you would have expected like before. Obviously whatever had harnessed her genes had complete power over them now, and her rapid spurt leaves her lab in shambles and her height at roughtly sixty feet tall. Chaos blooms.

It was too late for any sort od dodging, but you should have known anyway. Pieces of not only the roof, but also the walls that were crumbling inward dip in to meet you, and you are partially buried under the rubble that was redcued to billions of tiny pieces. It didn't hurt at first, but the combined effort of all of these fragments leaves you coated in insulation, bits of sheetrock and plaster, the works. The last glimpse you get is off your traumatized teacher, fanning her hands in panic. So different from the calm and rational biology teacher you had known her to be. But then again, no one had ever gone through what she just had before, to the public knowledge. You had to give her a break on that one.

Miss Blaker recovers quickly enough, though, and you can feel the heap of rubble being scraped off of you by her colossal fingers. They were like treet trunks in your eyes, but nonetheless you welcomed the relief they brought with them. In seconds all of it was cleared away, and with a pained grunt you were actually able to sit up. Signs of extertion were present under her eyes as she gazed down at you. But it was no longer just the two of you, for obvious reasons. Teachers, faculty, and students had all come rushing out to see if the lab had actually blown up this time, only to marvel at a much more tragic event. The towering woman stuck out as much as was humanly possible.
"Thanks," is all you can muster, hoping she even heard it.

Those of your male peers who knew Miss Blake drooled a the sight of the tremendous (and scantily clad) woman, who may have just died of sheer embarassment. You too had been fighting the same urge, but you thought yourself a great deal more mature in the events leading up to it. The giantess was sitting on the remains of this wing of the school, looking about wildly. Every motion of hers seemed more weighed-down and pronounced, probably due to her extra weight and size. It was still nothing like how giant monsters walking in the movies, however. It didn't take long for fire trcusk and police cars to line up at the school, and you feel utter pity for your teacher as you pick yourself up.

You close down the computer, being extra cautious about anyone potentially reading what was on it. As you head out to go see Rebecca, and maybe get an answer if she didn't squish you like a bug for finding out about this, you weren't watching where you were going and accidentally bump into your sister, Amy. Amy was 16 years old, a year younger than you, and 5'4", with shoulder length red hair. Her perky C-cup breasts would make her quite the standout...if it were not for several other girls in your school with bigger assets. And Rebecca's attention-holding body. (whether other boys in her science classes prior to this 'accident' actually paid attention to the subject matter at hand was another matter, you suspect) Being the nice guy you were, you apologize to your sister.

"Whoops! I didn't see you there, Amy! Sorry! My mind was...somewhere else..." You say. Amy looks about ready to wring your neck, but quickly looks down and seems to drop the anger. "Ant, you really gotta get Miss Blake, or should I say, Rebecca, off your brain." She teases, a little too quickly. You look down below her eyes, getting another tease in the process, ("Hey! My eyes are up here, Ant!") and you notice that your sister has her hands behind her back as though hiding something. You try looking over to the left, and she turns to keep her back from you. Right, and the same thing happens. Finally, you say, "Hey, mom!" as though your mother was directly behind Amy. She turned around without thinking, taking the bait hook, line, and sinker. Acting quickly, you snatch the object she was holding. "I don't see mom - Hey! Give that back! It's mine!"

You ignore your sister's protests and take a look at what you held in your hand. It was a flask, with a strange liquid inside. Popping the cap off, you took a careful smell. Whatever this liquid was, it smells strong and horrible. Popping the cap back on, you remember overhearing your sister remarking about how awesome Rebecca looked as she outgrew the building as you came home. You didn't think much of her comment at the time, but now you had a bad feeling about what was in the flask... You try getting a straight answer first. Maybe she will confess what she was up to? "What is this? Aside from 'yours'?" You hold the flask up out of her reach, not entirely an easy feat considering she was only a few inches shorter or so than you, but she seems...almost scared to try and jump to grab it even though other things you've done this with in the past she had no compunction about even tackling you to the ground to get the thing out of your hand. Clearly whatever you held was too important for her to risk breaking.

Your sister says quickly, "Nothing... But give it back now!" You know better than that to do that and let her get away without telling you what she was really up to. You ultimately decide to...
1333211111212.title: Amy's...up to something.

choices: "...P-45 to make an antidote."
"...help to restrain Miss Blake should she resist the antidote."
13332111112122.content:
"Fine. Then you won't mind me checking out your computer then." You say, and watch with satisfaction as Amy's eyes widen to the size of saucers in fear. "Wait! Y-you can't just go into my room!" She pleads, which falls on your currently deaf ears.

"Why not? You do it all the time to me. About time I return the favor anyway." You remind her as you step into her room. Nothing looks too suspicious...until you notice the poster of a giantess flick on the back of the door. Now you are even more curious as you step over to Amy's computer and jiggle the mouse to wake the computer from sleep mode...and are greeted by a background featuring a voluptuous woman naked and towering over a skyscraper. You never guessed your sister was into giantesses. But this told nothing about the flask's contents. Just that Amy likes big girls, and now could not lie. You check her computer's Recycle Bin if there was anything in there, since the icon indicates that there's at least one file in it.

"How interesting. So you like big girls, do you, Amy?" You say aloud. You hear Amy retort, "Apparently so do you, Ant. Or did you not think someone wouldn't notice that you were conveniently missing when Rebecca burst out of our school? But I suppose you had her too plastered in your skull to remember we share the same Math class on Mondays..." You...admittedly forgot about that. Still, you aren't deterred from finding out what Amy was keeping behind your back.

Clicking on the Recycle Bin icon to open it up, you come across...the 'Other Properties of P-45' document. This was your answer. The flask contained P-45. You realize Amy must have slipped into Rebecca's lab before you did and copied her files. Would possibly explain why it was still running when you entered, but wouldn't Rebecca keep her computer password-protected in case of such a thing, especially such a sensitive document she apparently does not want falling into the wrong hands?

"'Other Properties of P-45'. So that's what this stuff is? How did you make this? And how did you access Rebecca's computer?" You say sternly, turning toward Amy. You have half a mind to just simply pour the stuff down the drain and be done with it...but, it might be needed to create an antidote for Rebecca even if she may not want one. Maybe she changed her mind after it was too late for all you know.

You see and hear Amy sigh in defeat and came clean...so you hope. "Alright, I'll spill. Yes, that's the P-45 Miss Blake created." You're surprised by her not using Rebecca's first name. Maybe she only uses it to get at you? You let Amy continue. "At least, that's it before the materials react to create the final result. If it was the end result, I'd be awesomely huge by now and we wouldn't be having this conversation. You do not even want to know what I had to do to get a lab secured to use their furnace tomorrow since school's suspended at the moment. Getting this far wasn't easy, but Miss Blake had a small amount of each of the required materials in the storage locker.

"As for accessing her computer...that was actually surprisingly easy. I got curious as to where you had gotten off to when we were told to evacuate, found the big hole in the wall leading to Miss Blake's lab. I wonder why?" Amy ponders to you sarcastically, then continues again. "I found her computer, turned it on, and came across the log in prompt. I was ready to give up when a thought came into my head as to a possible password. Let's just say, I'm very familiar with the password. I hear it all the time, Anthony..." Amy stresses your name and being very familiar with Rebecca's password. A realization hits you like a ton of bricks.

"You never call me by my full name. Virtually no one does. ...Wait. You don't mean to tell me that..." Amy smiles to you and replies, "DING! DING! DING! We have a winner! Her number one student who's been crushing her all year long now... You. Did you see anyone else from class have their birthday marked in her birthdays folder? I sure didn't. And before you ask, I saw you go in there not even a minute after I got out of there."

You see Amy's smile shift into a mischievous one, as she says, "Now then...I've told you everything...but you are going to help me achieve giantess-hood." You look at your sister strangely. Help her become like Rebecca? "And why would I do that? I'm only interested in finding an antidote for Rebecca, not Attack of the 50 Foot Sister." To which she replies to you, mischievous smile getting ever wider, "Because, dear Ant, you'll need my..."

You're totally oblivious to what is going on in the room next to you due to your sleep. Your sister Amy is sitting on her bed with the glow of her laptop illuminating her facial features. A look of interest is plastered on her face as she researches the ingredients of the growth formula on the internet. She is most fascinated by the information on Garngantua-12. There is not much about it due to it being such a scarce enzyme, but there are one or two websites dedicated to information on such rare biological occurrences.
Amy finds a website describing a tiger born in a zoo in 1947 that grew at an unusually large rate but behaved the same as its siblings. By the time it was a year old it was twice as large as its mother, and by the time it was two years old it was about ten times bigger. The zoo was promptly closed down because the government felt it was important to hide a secret such as a 37ft tall tiger. The tiger kept growing and when it was about two and a half, it suddenly turned hostile for some unknown reason. The zoo wasn't expecting this, and the giant tiger ate all of the tigers in its enclosure and two zookeepers before it was killed by another zookeeper wielding a rifle. The corpse of the animal was sent off to some biologists and the never-seen-before enzyme Garngantua-12 was discovered attached to its pituitary gland. The biologists made some more of the enzyme and stored it in a locked container. This was covered up by the government but one of the biologists involved posted the entire story to a blog he published.

This interested Amy because the tiger turned hostile after a while. She wondered if this was because it was stressed out by its size or if the Garngantua-12 enzyme had some kind of adverse effect on the tiger's brain. Either way, if Amy's theory was correct, this would happen to Miss Blake too but a lot sooner due to the amount of the enzyme she drank. She would not just be a sexy giantess, but a sexy, evil, rampaging giantess. This was Amy's dream! She couldn't let Miss Blake take the role of evil queen of the city, so the only option would be to tag along with Ant the next day and find out more. She closed the lid of her laptop and went to sleep with a smile on her face, dreaming dreams of being 200ft tall...

1333211111221111.content:
You wake up suddenly, being freed from the reins of a nightmare you were previously having. It involved running from the giant feet of a giantess, although it wasn't Miss Blake. You lie in your bed for a few minutes trying to recall the dream and suddenly it hits you: the giantess was Amy, your own sister. You can remember her face vividly as she laughed at the destruction she was causing: stepping on buildings and some strange super power that allowed her to make people burst in an explosion of blood and gore just by pointing at them. This dream was probably caused by the interesting conversation Amy and your mum were having at dinner last night.

Turning over, you look at your alarm clock. 06:32, it reads. Quietly getting out of bed so you don't wake up anyone, you slip on some clothes and write a brief note to put on the fridge explaining to your parents that you've gone to check on Miss Blake. They wouldn't mind, knowing them.
Opening your door very slowly and stepping out into the hall while being careful to avoid the creaky floorboard, you notice the bathroom door is closed with light seeping out from the edges. A quiet rustle sounds from behind the wooden door and shortly afterwards, it swings open unquietly. As you suspected, it's Amy, looking like she had just been applying her makeup. She doesn't look surprised in the slightest to see you up so early, but the same is not true for you.
"Ant!" she whispers. "Are you going to see that Biology teacher you have a crush on?"
"Yes," you reply. "I mean no! I don't-"
"Never mind, I know what you mean," she laughs. "I'm coming with you."
"What!?" you retort in shock. "No you're not! Why would you want to, anyway?"
"Why shouldn't I?" she challenges. "You never know when I might be able to help! Besides, are you going to try to stop me?"
You begin to go downstairs, but she quickly follows you. Ignoring her, you throw on a coat and open the front door as quietly as possible. She also grabs a coat and slips out the front door before you can close it.
"Fine, you can come. Just don't be a nuisance and don't make Miss Blake uncomfortable," you warn her.
"A nuisance? I'm only a year younger than you!" she laughs, to which you don't respond. You both head off in silence down the road towards school, the ground trembling faintly. You assume this is to do with Miss Blake.

You and Amy reach Miss Blake about five minutes later. The sky is still dim but there is light appearing over the horizon in the distance as the sun rises. The air is still yet moist and a few birds are beginning to chirp sweetly. The tranquil environment blends in well with Miss Blake: the curvy, delicious giant woman lying on the ground sleeping peacefully. You try your hardest not to form a hard-on at the sight of her near-naked giant body, and Amy seems to be holding back giggles at your embarrassment.
"How do we wake her up?" Amy says suddenly. You hadn't thought of this. Waking a giantess could be a very difficult task.
"Uh, let's make some noise," you suggest, "she should be able to hear us with ears as big as hers."
"HEY, DUMBO!! WAKE UP!!!" Amy yells, taking your big ears comment a tad too far.
"Amy, don't! We don't want to offend someone of her size!" you urge her.
"Oh that's right! I shouldn't embarrass you in front of your biggest crush, should I? I'm sorry," she teases. You want to shout at her but don't want to make a scene so you decide to stay quiet and ignore her silly remarks.

"Miss Blake!" you scream. "Hey!! Miss Blake! Rebecca!"
"Ooh, it's Rebecca now, is it?" Amy teases again. "Getting personal, are we?"
"Wake up!" you continue shouting, ignoring your sister's comment. "It's no use, she isn't even budging."
Amy scratches her chin for a moment as if in deep thought. "Can't we find the ingredients to the growth serum ourselves? I mean, surely she has everything in her lab at school if she made it in the first place?" Amy suggests. "All we would need is her blood and she should be awake by then..."
"That's actually not a bad idea," you reply. "The ingredients wouldn't be destroyed during her growth as everything in her lab is kept in heavy metal cabinets. We should be able to find them, but Miss Blake might be upset that we're snooping through her stuff."
"Well, we'd better decide before she wakes up," Amy warns you...

Within a minute, even 10 miles starts to seem small as you grow past that mark. To your delight, you don't feel light-headed at all, despite having left the troposphere behind well under your nipples, harder than diamonds thanks to the dwindling temperatures the higher you continue to grow and especially by how turned on all this power and growth was making you. Either way, you would be worshiped as the goddess you were and deserved to be. Either way, you'd never stop growing. You sure like win-win situations.

After a moment, and growing to 100 miles without a sign of stopping, you settle on your decision. A decision befitting a goddess.

"Hah, yeah right." you reply sceptically. "Besides, there are plenty of other girls out there who are way better than Suzy." you continue. Brian lets out a restrained laugh.

*1 hour later*

The bell finally sounds after the usual long, dreariness of Maths. You pick up your things and quickly leave the room, trying to avoid Brian but he follows you anyway.
"Hey, you sure you don't want to try out that ray gun thing, mate?" he asks again. You sigh.
"Look, unless you can prove that it actually exists and works, I'm not interested, sorry." you explain. He looks slightly disappointed and begins to walk off, but something appears to catch his eye.
"Oh man, it's our lucky day!" he exclaims, gesturing towards a girl you did not recognise. "Who's that chick!?"
You must admit, she is rather good looking. She had long brown hair, a petite but slightly curvy figure, and long legs. However you had not seen her around before. She was looking rather lost, perhaps she was new?
"Um, excuse me?" you say slightly nervously, approaching her. "Are you okay? You look a little... lost."
She turns around suddenly and looks at you. "Ah, you startled me!" she exclaims in a rather strong French accent. You glance at Brian for a second and notice he is tidying up his clothes. Typical of him!
"Oui, I am on my first day at this school. I come from France!" she tells you. "I cannot seem to find my lesson, though..." she says, looking lost again.
"Oh that's okay, we'll help!" Brian interjects, making you jump. "What lesson are you supposed to have?" he asks, pushing you out the way. He was always all over the good looking females.
"Umm..." she hums, thinking. "I think the teacher said to me that I have l'histoire in the next lesson."
"Er, sorry?" he asks, confused. You roll your eyes, he never did pay attention in French.
"She means history." you tell him. "Doesn't that mean she's in our class?"
Brian quickly checks his timetable, and with a smile on his face he nods. "You're in our class!" he says quickly. The girl giggles happily. "Would you show me the way?" she asks, to which Brian happily nods. They were getting on surprisingly well.

"Oh, I forgot to introduce myself!" she says suddenly, stopping in her tracks. "Je m'appelle Yasmina!" she announces cheerfully, giving you a small kiss on each cheek, and Brian shortly afterwards. Brian blushes big-time and almost loses his cool, but you realise this was the French equivalent of shaking hands or something. "Nice to meet the both of you!" she continues. "And thank you for showing me to my class, you are both tres genereux!"

info.brief_description: May contain giantesses. Do not use if allergic to giant women. 65,000+ views!
info.description:
A different view of my interactive 'Shrunk at High School!'. This time, there are all the same characters, but your female classmates grow rather than you shrinking!
Rules:
No gay (lesbian is fine).
No scat.
No male growth.
Please try to use good grammar and spelling. I'll edit typos out of chapters where I notice them.
Keep swearing to a minimum please, for the sake of this site's rating system.
Sex is fine, as long as the characters involved are not minors.
Gore/graphic scenes are fine for the sake of vore/crushing but don't go overboard again for the sake of keeping the story 18+ not GC.
The most important rule: Have fun & don't be shy to add!

Main Characters:
You: Anthony (often called Ant), 5ft 9in, age 17. You have light brown hair, and you're quite ordinary looking yet also quite athletic. You are pretty smart but also very curious and sometimes stubborn. This has gotten you into trouble many times before.

Mike: 5ft 10in, age 17. Mike has bleached blonde hair and enjoys playing sports. He's your best mate since you were young. He's a laugh to be around and is very loyal to his friends, but can be quite rash and short tempered at times. He refuses to back down when challenged by someone or something.

Beth: 5ft 5in, age 17. She has medium length blonde hair, thick-rimmed glasses, and a full figured hourglass-shaped body. She doesn't really like you. She is known for her unusual and demented behaviour such as grabbing and kissing random people. This has earned her the title of "psycho" from many of your classmates. She is good friends with Suzy and Kirstie.

Emily: 5ft 7in, age 16. She is a smart girl who you get on with very well. She has fiery red hair, a very pretty face, and quite a slim build. She's probably the most laid back person you know, and has a tendency to flirt with you harmlessly. However she often handles unusual situations badly and is also somewhat fickle. She gets on with everyone reasonably well.

Maria: 5ft 4in, age 18. Maria is somewhat small, being quite short and slim, but with a disproportionately large ass. She has a reputation for sleeping around and never having the same boyfriend for more than a week. You don't have much in common with her. She is a lot more intelligent than she likes to let on. She is good friends with Suzy, Kirstie, Whitney and Mike.

Rebecca Blake: 5ft 11in, age 25. Miss Blake is your science teacher. She has jet black-shoulder length hair, curves that would make a lot of models jealous, and is also quite tall. Despite this she often wears tall stiletto heels, giving her a somewhat imposing appearance. It is clear that you're her favourite student, however she tries to treat all classmates fairly. She is mostly personable and friendly, however there is a darker side to her personality.

Suzy: 6ft 6in, age 19. Suzy is an Amazon of a woman with blonde hair, long tree trunk-like legs, a larger build, and large breasts. She cannot stand you and seems to get off on subjugating and humiliating you, often physically and verbally. Despite this you can't help but lust after her looks. She gets on with Kirstie, Beth, Tara, Maria, Izzy, and somehow your friend Emily.

Kirstie: 6ft 4in, age 17. She could almost be the (slightly) shorter, slimmer, nerdier little sister of Suzy. She has dirty-blonde hair and wears large glasses. The only person you know who hates you and hurts you more than Suzy does. She genuinely scares you. Everyone you know is terrified of her at least a little, even people she calls her friends. She hangs out with Suzy, Sapphyre, Beth, Tara, Maria and Rhiannon.

Rhiannon: 6ft 0in, age 17. She has long dark blonde hair and a slim but very fit figure. She is in most of the same classes as you, and you have something of a crush on her (something she seems oblivious to). She's a very naive and sweet girl and probably wouldn't hurt a fly even if she had to. She is a little insecure about her unusual height. Her best friends are Emily, Kirstie, Mike, Ant and Izzy.

Minor Characters:
Izzy: 5ft 7in, age 16. She has frizzy black hair, an eye catching figure, and a mousy but attractive face. She is very obsessed with you, which annoys you most of the time. She doesn't seem to care, though. She can get quite vicious when she sees you with another girl, whether it's a romantic interest or not. You could swear you've seen her hanging around near your house alone even though she lives almost an hour away from you. She is friends with Emily, Rhiannon, Suzy, Kirstie, and Mike.

Danielle: 5ft 6in, age 18. She has dark brown straightened hair and a slim figure with large breasts that she likes to show off. Most of the guys in your school are smitten with her and do whatever she says, although she seems nice enough on the surface. Her closest friends hint that she's not as straightforward and normal as she seems. Emily is her inseparable best friend, but she is also friends with Ant and Mike.

Lex: 5ft 10in, about 22 or 23 years old. She is Danielle's older sister. She has long (dyed) blonde hair and a nice body. She has a very laid back personality and a good sense of humour, but you can't help but feel something is slightly "off" about her. She doesn't attend your school, you've only met her twice before outside of school.

Sapphyre: 5ft 4in, age 18. She has raven hair with blue highlights, and dresses in gothic clothing. You don't know her too well but she seems quite arrogant and narcissistic. A lot of younger girls in the school seem to idolise her. She is somewhat a rival to Whitney, both girls being so popular. You heard somewhere that Sapphyre isn't her real name. She's good friends with Kirstie, Suzy and Beth.

Tara: 5ft 5in, age 17. Tara is a pretty brunette girl who is quite shy and modest. She is on the timid side and tends to follow her friends most of the time instead of being too independent. Unfortunately some people take advantage of her shyness and use it to control her. On her own, she seems friendly and outgoing. She is friends with Suzy and Kirstie who play her like a puppet.

Gwen: 5ft 6in, age 18. She has brown hair and seems to permanently walk with a limp for unknown reasons. She is a friend of yours, but tends to stay out of social circles for the most part. She is kind and funny but can be overly harsh on people sometimes. For this reason lots of people don't like her. To you, she just comes across as misunderstood. Friends with Ant, Mike and Emily.

Whitney: 5ft 4in, age 16. She has dyed hot pink hair. Whitney is very popular and is also very vain and arrogant. You don't really like her. She is always seen wearing expensive designer clothes, and is never without her sunglasses. Despite this she is not bad looking. She seems to rival to Sapphyre for popularity, and they often clash over this subject. Friends with Kirstie, Suzy and Maria.

Chelsea: 5ft 3in, age 17. Chelsea has bleached blonde hair and a gorgeous, curvy body. She's the stereotypical dumb blonde, but with enough intelligence to use her looks to her advantage. She's malicious and nasty to most people, but can be quite pleasant and seductive to people she wants something from. Nearly everyone hates her.

Holly: 5ft 5in, age 18. Holly is a bit of an ordinary girl in both looks and personality. She has medium length brown hair and quite plain features: she is neither beautiful nor ugly. However she keeps to herself and her personality is not well known. She seems to know Mike quite well, but to everyone else she comes across as mysterious and distant.

Laura: 9ft 1in, age unknown (she looks about 24). She is blonde, unnaturally tall and has an impossibly curvy figure. She is the mother of a friend of yours (Brian) who has invented a growth ray, probably explaining her height. She is VERY flirty but also can be sensible and reasonable.

Yasmina: 5ft 7in, age 17. She has a small, petite figure with long legs and long, brown hair. She recently moved from France to your school, you don't know her yet but you've heard about her. Her English is a little broken, and as a result she says a lot of words in French. Cheerful, giggly, smiley and bubbly. She grows slowly when angry or frustrated.

Brian: 5ft5in, age 17. One of your friends. Brian has short brown hair, is quite short (to his annoyance) and is a little chubby. He often tries to flirt with attractive girls but usually ends up making a fool of himself. Thinks he is smarter than he is, though he is good at making people laugh. He's well intentioned, just a little annoying.

-Willum
